mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of USOM Director Charles Mann welcoming Congressman Moore and an unidentified man
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Joint United States Public Affairs Office (JUSPAO) Press Section
mdRecord.dcterms:description: U.S. Operations Mission (USOM) Director Charles Mann welcoming Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. and two unidentified men to Vietnam. The Director is shaking hands with an unidentified man.
